concept.title: Create a customization plugin
concept.shortdesc: The first step is to create a customization plugin or a plugin that fully reuse the html5 plugin.

conbody.p: A customization plugin is a plugin which allows you to alter all html5 transform. This way, all your transformation will include your change in the semantic.

A plugin that reuse the html5 plugin, is a plugin, fully independant which import the xsl and override them. This way, you can create multiple plugins, with different semantic from the same plugin. Here we will see the plugin that reuse the html5 plugin.
